price: 34. Ce sont des descendances issues les unes des autres, et Allah Entend Tout et Il est Omniscient.
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَۢ بَعۡضُهَا مِنۢ بَعۡضٖۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyatan baʿḍuhā min baʿḍin wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
